column4: Pre-workshop survey: What is your current position?
column5: Pre-workshop survey: Please specify your main academic discipline. Please take the entry which is closest to your main field of study/work.
column6: Pre-workshop survey: What is the operating system that you will use during the course (on your laptop)?
column7: Pre-workshop survey: Which version of operating system are you using? If your operating system is Linux, which distribution are you using? This will help us to create more targeted installation instructions.
column8: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using version control? If yes, which?
column9: Pre-workshop survey: Which programming languages are you using or will you use in your projects?
column10: Pre-workshop survey: Do you write tests (e.g. unit tests, integration tests, ...) in your programming project(s)?
column11: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using automated testing platforms (e.g. Travis CI, Jenkins or GitLab CI) in your programming project(s)?
column12: Pre-workshop survey: Are you employing code review in your programming project(s)?
column13: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using Jupyter Notebooks in your programming project(s)?
column14: Pre-workshop survey: How do you document your code?
column15: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using a web-based repository for your code(s)? Which ones?
column16: Pre-workshop survey: How would you describe your programming experience?
column17: Pre-workshop survey: How comfortable are you with the Unix/Linux command line working in a terminal window?
column18: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using an integrated development environment (IDE) for your programming project(s)?
column19: Pre-workshop survey: Please select the sessions that you are most interested in.
column20: Pre-workshop survey: Where did you find out this CodeRefinery workshop?
column21: Pre-workshop survey: What do you expect to get from this course?
